formattedAddress: 455 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 455 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: Wonderful facial, thank you, Aniko! Above and beyond treatment with friendly, positive staff. They care and go the extra mile. This is my favorite spa in New York and I enjoy coming here to bring friends and family too. We love it.

text.text: Wonderful facial, thank you, Aniko! Above and beyond treatment with friendly, positive staff. They care and go the extra mile. This is my favorite spa in New York and I enjoy coming here to bring friends and family too. We love it.

originalText.text:
A true 5 star experience.
Went with my wife and had an amazing experience.
Brian and Juliana were amazing.
Definitely recommend getting the VIP couples room where we had our own private shower and sauna.

originalText.text:
I had an exceptional experience at the Ila  Spa that I can't help but rave about. From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere exuded relaxation and tranquility. The staff was not only professional but also incredibly friendly, making me feel welcomed.

The attention to detail during my nail service was impressive. My technician Olga exhibited a high level of skill and precision, ensuring that my nails were not only aesthetically pleasing but also well-cared for. The range of nail colors and designs to choose from was extensive, catering to various preferences.

The spa maintained impressive cleanliness and hygiene standards, offering a comforting and confidence-inducing atmosphere. The tools were thoughtfully sanitized, contributing to an overall hygienic environment.

Upon leaving the nail tech and spa, I not only felt satisfied with the results but also revitalized. Their commitment to customer satisfaction and dedication to excellence were apparent. I highly recommend this establishment to anyone in search of a premium nail and spa experience.

originalText.text:
I have been to some of the top spas in NYC such as Aire, Mandarin, Rego, Ritz Carlton, Guerlain, Peninsula just to name a few and I have to say - if you are truly serious about getting a 5 star treatment and have an amazing experience look no further than ila Spa!

Our massage therapists Brian and Erin were world class from start to finish. My only regret is that we didn't do a 90 minute couples massage instead of the 60min! Post treatment in the lounge area Bradley was nice enough to offer us some tea, chocolate pretty much anything - extremely hospitable and we didnt want to leave! I can certainly tell you one thing - this is now my go to 100% full stop!
Next time we are both going to have a facial - I hear they have the finest Estheticians in the city and if the massage is any indication I'm already convinced! Thanks ila Spa!

originalText.text:
I recently visited the spa for a birthday massage with my boyfriend, and unfortunately, our experience was marred by a distressing incident. While we were both in our respectful locker rooms, a homeless individual entered the men's locker rooms, causing significant disruption and damage to the facilities. Only later did we find out the intruder was homeless, which added to the unease, especially considering being undressed in the locker room.

Although the staff addressed the situation a week later and reimbursed us for our treatment, it was a very unsettling and unexpected turn of events on what should have been a special occasion. Furthermore, the fact that this individual had previously broken in multiple times raises concerns about the spa’s and hotel’s security measures.

While I appreciate the staff's efforts to rectify the situation, the overall safety and security of guests, especially in vulnerable situations like changing in the locker room, should be a top priority. Adding to the unusual circumstances, I found myself mistakenly included in a new staff onboarding email thread, receiving unrelated onboarding emails. This administrative oversight added an extra layer of inconvenience.

Despite the quality of the massage treatment and the staff's responsiveness to the security issue, the combination of these events has left us with reservations about returning to this spa or this hotel in the future. I hope the management takes these incidents seriously and implements necessary measures to ensure the safety and privacy of their guests in the future.
